description:
This application is available for clients approached by bank. 
New VÚB Banking application brings secure and clear access to your complete finances, cards and loans. The application brings many novelties, such as more secure login using a digital code, the possibility of logging in multiple clients on one device, or even easier withdrawals from an ATM. In addition, the application is clear and intuitive, with the possibility of adapting it to your own needs. 

Most popular features:
#withCASH - possibility to withdraw money from an ATM without the need of a plastic card
#withKEY - safest way to authorize transactions with one time use digital code 
SEPA instant payments - online payments to selected banks in Slovakia

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

With Tatra banka app you are the first in Slovakia to:

- open a current account, student, self employed or business account completely online,
- take a loan online within a few minutes even if you are not yet our client,
- manage your finances anywhere, anytime.

The bank app is for mobile devices with iOS 16.0 or higher and available also on smart watch.

Top functionalities of Tatra banka application:

1. Online current, self employed and business account opening and digital lending* with secure Face biometrics technology
2. Cash withdrawal from Tatra banka ATMs by mobile
3. Overview of accounts and loans
- View balances and movements, ability to respond to received payment, optional overdraft report, monthly statement in PDF
4. Payment card management 
- Set daily limits on a debit or credit card as needed, blocking the card, displaying a PIN code, one-time card number 
5. MaFin finance management - prediction of expenses and balance for the selected period, categorization of expenses, setting goals, monitoring assets and liabilities
6. Online opening of Investment savings in Mutual funds
7. Payment order, invoice and IBAN scanner, standing order management and SEPA direct debit
8. Push notifications about account and credit card movements 
9. Map of branches and ATMs, exchange rates, contacts
10. Activating VIAMO payments to phone number
11. Customer support via chatbot Adam – in the app Adam will help with changing the contact data, card limits, display the card PIN code, set up b-mail for a credit card
12. Lite version of the application for easier and more intuitive access to account information, cards, savings or loans. The Lite version is an ideal solution for students, young people as well as all users who want to orient themselves faster in the complex world of finance
13. Display of balance and last movements on the smart watches.

As a Tatra banka client you have a unique opportunity to use mobile payments via Apple Pay. 

If you have any questions, ideas or need to solve a specific problem, please contact us:
- via e-mail address iphone@tatrabanka.sk or
- through contacts on the Tatra banka website www.tatrabanka.sk/en/about-bank/contacts/.

*in this process, the app receives a device identifier for the purpose of displaying offers and information about the bank's products in third-party applications on that device. You can turn off this identifier in your phone's settings. For more information, see www.tatrabanka.sk/privacy_policy.

About XTB
XTB is a global financial institution trusted by over 1.7 million clients. We provide access to a wide range of investment options including stocks, ETFs,CFD trading on currencies, commodities, indices, and more. Our platform also includes Investment Plans, interest on uninvested funds and ISA. All of this is available in one easy-to-use app — a single, powerful ecosystem where your money works.

Buy stocks and ETFs commission-free
The XTB app gives you access to over 4500 stocks and ETFs from 16 major exchanges around the world. Invest in stocks and ETFs with 0% commission.*

Choose from thousands of CFDs
Trade CFDs based on currency pairs (Forex), commodities, indices, stocks, and ETFs.

Make the most of our savings solutions:

Investment Plans
At XTB, you can create a personalised Investment Plan that will help you regularly set aside small amounts, invest passively and reach your desired goals, like: travel, retirement, or a new house.

Interest on free funds
You can profit while waiting for the perfect investment opportunity. All your uninvested funds earn interest.

Flexible Stocks & Shares ISA
An ISA  is a tax-efficient savings and investment account that allows you to earn interest or returns without paying tax on them.

2FA - an extra layer of security
We implemented 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) through SMS verification to ensure that no one gains unauthorized access to your XTB account. 

Safe and secure deposits and withdrawals
Make a deposit instantly by credit/debit cards like Visa/Mastercard. Easily transfer funds between sub-accounts within XTB or withdraw to your personal bank account - all safely and securely. 

24h/5 support
Our customer service team offers support in 18 languages and is available 24/5 hours a day,  via email, chat or phone.

Free demo account
Open a free demo account in seconds and explore your investment ideas with zero risk. Experience real market conditions without using your own capital. When you’re ready, open a real  XTB account for free and start putting your money to work for real.

Trainings and webinars
Explore our extensive video library and gain access to hundreds of hours of educational webinars. Learn at your own pace with clear, structured content . 

Market news and analysis
Get breaking news and read professional market analysis from our award-winning research team.

Advanced charts and technical analysis
Find the best investment opportunities using over 35 indicators, different chart types, advanced technical analysis, and other features in the app.

Additional investing tools
Stay ahead with our suite of investing tools: track key macroeconomic events with the Economic Calendar, manage risk and plan using the Investor’s Calculator, set real-time Price Alerts to catch market moves and explore global Market Sentiment to make more informed decisions.

*For monthly turnover up to 100,000 EUR. Transactions above this limit will be charged a commission of 0.2% (minimum 10 GBP).
**CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 
72% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider.
You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Your capital is at risk. The value of your investments may go up or down.Tax treatment depends on your individual circumstances and ISA regulations which may change.T&Cs apply.

The Reader application is intended for Tatra banka clients who have activated the Internet bankingTB service and serves to generate codes for logging in, activating or authorizing transactions in Tatra banka's electronic channels.

The reader is equivalent to the standard Card and Reader authorization and authentication tool, and is equally secure.

The reader can be activated
- Directly in the application - using facial biometrics. For activation, you need PID - personal identification number, a valid Slovak ID card, an SMS code sent during activation to your profile phone number, and a scan of your face.
- In person at the branch
- By phone
During activation, the Reader prompts the user to set a login password, the expiration time of which depends on its complexity, and to set a fingerprint for more convenient login.
The Reader requires an Internet connection for activation and updating. Subsequently, it can also be used offline.
Complete information as well as the terms of use of the Reader can be found at www.tatrabanka.sk.
The current version of the Reader application is available for devices with the iOS 14 and higher operating system.

developer: Slovenska sporitelna, a.s. v skratke SLSP, a.s.
description:
Hi, I´m George and I´m bringing the new smart banking to your smart phone or tablet.


What can I do?


I bank anywhere in the world



No matter if you are on a bus, at work or on holiday. With me, your finances are always at hand. All you need is a safe internet connection. 




I will save all your important contacts


I can automatically save all entered IBANs that you assign specific names to. You do not have to remember complicated numbers; I will make entering future payments easier for you.




I will sign you in easily with your fingerprint


You can easily log in to app using a fingerprint. Login with 6-digit code is also available.




I pay by scanning


Forget complicated entering of the IBAN. Using your smart phone camera, I will scan IBANs, QR codes, barcodes and postal vouchers, speeding up and making your payments faster.




I will convert foreign currencies


With the mobile currency calculator you will always know what expenses to expect when staying abroad. Enable location services and I will automatically convert from and to the given currency of the country you are currently in. Helpful 
hint: you can open the currency calculator by holding the George icon.




I am fun and colourful

In your cell phone you can also set your own colours, names and photos or even arrange your main page.





I am a master of searching


I can find transactions not only by names in the address list, but also by the time period or merchant you were buying from. All you need to do is enter various key words that I will even suggest to you directly on the search screen.



I am pleased that you chose me to do your smart banking.

Yours sincerely, George!

The ČSOB SmartBanking App is intended primarily for ČSOB clients having an active electronic banking service.

To activate the secured part, your IPPID identification number and PIN (identical to Internetbanking) are required. After entering these into the App, the Bank will send you an activation key to the agreed mobile number, or you can generate it via Token. The activation key is only necessary for activating the App, which is also the first login.

The next time you use the App, only your PIN is required. You can change it at any time via My ČSOB internet banking. We recommend that you change your PIN immediately after activating electronic banking services.

If necessary, you can deactivate the App or change some of its parameters in the Settings menu.

Other functions of the public part are accessible without logging in, also for users who are not ČSOB clients.

The app is available in Slovak, English and Hungarian.

You can find more information after installing the App in the "About App" section. At the same time there is ČSOB Infoline available to you at helpdeskeb@csob.sk or on phone number 0850 111 777, from abroad 00421 259 668 844.

SmartToken is a mobile banking application designed for ČSOB clients, which is used for electronic signature and client login in ČSOB electronic banking services.
Each generated code is unique and its validity is limited in time.

The application must be activated before first use. For activation you need a unique activation key from an SMS, or obtained through a branch or ČSOB Infoline.
An internet connection is required to activate the application. After activation, it can be also used in offline mode.

Never provide the generated codes to other persons and do not enter them into websites and applications that do not belong to ČSOB. The Bank will never ask you to send or notify the code generated by the SmartToken application or other security codes.

V mobilnej aplikácii Home Credit máte financie pod kontrolou kedykoľvek a kdekoľvek. Nájdete v nej všetko o svojej pôžičke, konsolidácii aj nákupe na splátky. Pod palcom máte splácanie, pohyby na účte aj ďalšie čerpanie. Na bezpečné platenie tam na vás čaká virtuálna karta.
Do aplikácie sa jednoducho prihlásite kódom, odtlačkom prsta alebo rozpoznaním tváre. Vybrať si môžete svetlý alebo tmavý režim, ktorý je šetrný pre vaše oči.
Vyskúšajte aplikáciu ešte dnes a dajte nám vedieť, ako sa vám páči.



Jednoduché splácanie a údaje o splátke
Ihneď po prihlásení vidíte aktuálny stav aj termín splátky. Odoslanie splátky vybavíte na pár kliknutí cez ikonu svojej banky alebo pomocou QR kódu. Číslo účtu, sumu a variabilný symbol vyplníme za vás.


Mesačné výpisy v digitálnej podobe
Šetríme našu prírodu. V aplikácii nájdete na jednom mieste výpisy za posledných 12 mesiacov.


Rýchly prevod peňazí
Stačí pár kliknutí v aplikácii a peniaze putujú na váš bankový účet. Využiť môžete aj platbu prostredníctvom QR kódu. Keď potrebujete viac, môžete si požiadať o navýšenie úverového rámca.


Virtuálna karta na bezpečné platenie
Kartu si aktivujete v priebehu pár sekúnd priamo v aplikácii. Než pôjdete do obchodu alebo bankomatu, pridajte si virtuálnu kartu do Peňaženky Google alebo Apple. V aplikácii si bezpečne zobrazíte údaje karty a potvrdíte online nákupy. V prípade potreby vyriešite blokáciu alebo zmenu limitov.


Pohyby na účte za celú históriu
V histórii transakcií vidíte prehľadne všetky svoje nákupy, prevody aj splátky.



Príklad úveru, ktorý môže byť ponúkaný v mobilnej aplikácii
Ilustratívny výpočet pre revolvingový úver na základe požiadaviek zákona: Pri úverovom rámci 
3 000,00 € je ročná úroková sadzba 19,9 %, RPMN 21,8 %, celkovo zaplatíte 3 323,38 €. Mesačné splátky sú postupne uvedené za jednotlivé mesiace: 299,75 €, 295,60 €, 291,46 €, 287,31 €, 283,17 €, 279,02 €, 274,88 €, 270,73 €, 266,58 €, 262,44 €, 258,29 €, 254,15 €. Splátky a celková suma, ktorú zaplatíte, sú matematicky zaokrúhlené. Tento príklad je iba ilustračný na základe zákonných predpokladov – čerpanie celej výšky úveru okamžite, bezhotovostne, v plnej výške, pri najvyššej úrokovej sadzbe a s najvyšším poplatkom. 

Poskytnutie úveru je počítané na 12 mesiacov pri splátkach s rovnakou výškou istiny. 
Konkrétna ponuka sa môže od prezentovanej líšiť. Ponuka nie je verejný prísľub a platí pri splnení podmienok Home Credit Slovakia, a.s., ktorý je poskytovateľom finančných služieb.

Jednoduché a rýchle bankovanie – Peňaženka od Prima banky

Peňaženka je výborný nástroj na sledovanie vašich financií. S aplikáciou získate dokonalý prehľad o vašich účtoch, úveroch, sporeniach, termínovaných vkladoch aj o platobných kartách. Môžete s ňou jednoducho a rýchlo platiť, nastaviť si pravidelné platby a inkasá, kontrolovať výdavky, zaznamenávať všetky svoje príjmy, či nastaviť si pripomienky na úhradu dôležitých platieb. Vďaka systému zálohy od Prima banky máte vaše údaje vždy bezpečne zálohované a synchronizované medzi všetkými vašimi zariadeniami.

Jednoduché prihlasovanie, dokonalý prehľad o svojich financiách, rýchle platby.
Možnosť jednoducho  požiadať o predschválenú Pôžičku alebo o Povolené prečerpanie na účte, či zriadenie Sporenia alebo vklady. 

Prihlasovanie do Peňaženky je maximálne jednoduché. Prihlásite sa svojim menom, heslom do Internet bankingu, a prihlásenie overíte SMS kódom. Po prvotnom prihlásení si nastavíte 4-miestny PIN, prípadne zvolíte prihlasovanie cez Touch ID alebo Face ID. Na ďalšie prihlasovanie už budete využívať len jednu z týchto možností. 
V Peňaženke máte pod palcom prehľad všetkých produktov, ktoré využívate, vrátane pohodlnej správy vašich platobných kariet (aktivácia, blokovanie, zmena PIN či denného limitu, znovuvydanie karty, povolenie/zakázanie internetových platieb). Jednoduchý filter transakcií vám umožní vyhľadať požadovanú transakciu podľa kategórie, dátumu, alebo prostredníctvom fulltextového vyhľadávania. Platby zadáte jednoducho naskenovaním čiarového kódu, QR kódu, použitím šablón alebo funkciou Zopakovať platbu či Odpovedať platbou. Jednoduchým ťapnutím si môžete stiahnuť a uložiť informácie o spracovanej transakcii alebo vytvoriť si z nej trvalý príkaz. 

Bezpečnosť platieb v Peňaženke je zabezpečená silnou autentifikáciou. Každá zadaná platba alebo trvalý príkaz je autorizovaný pomocou Vášho PIN kódu, ktorý ste si zadali pri prvotnom prihlásení do aplikácie, a ktorý poznáte iba vy. Platby môžete realizovať do výšky vášho denného limitu pre elektronické bankovníctvo. 

Získať predschválenú Pôžičku alebo Povolené prečerpanie k účtu ešte nikdy nebolo jednoduchšie. Stačí iba ťapnúť na ponuku v časti Úvery priamo v aplikácii Peňaženka. V časti Sporenia a vklady si môžete pohodlne zriadiť aj Termínovaný vklad alebo pravidelné Sporenie k Osobnému či Študentskému účtu. 
V Nastaveniach aplikácie si môžete nastaviť SMS notifikácie k účtu alebo Push notifikácie. Push notifikácie vám ponúkajú bezplatnú alternatívu k SMS notifikáciám a poskytujú dokonalý prehľad o každom pohybe na vašich účtoch alebo vás informujú o novej správe v schránke správ. 
 
K tomu všetkému nájdete v aplikácii aj prehľad pobočiek a bankomatov Prima banky spolu s kontaktnými informáciami a možnosťou rýchlej navigácie k nim.

V prípade otázok, podnetov, alebo akýchkoľvek problémov nás môžete kontaktovať priamo z hlavného menu aplikácie, telefonicky na našej nonstop Infolinke 0850 700 007, alebo e-mailom na adrese: info@primabanka.sk.

Prima banka

VÚB Bank brings you the award-winning VÚB Mobile Banking app, which gives you complete management of your finances and secure access to a number of services that make you no longer have to go to a branch. The app retains clarity and simplicity and you can customize it to suit your needs. 

Most popular features:
• Remote banking – possibility to contact your advisor, upload your documents, sign any necessary documents remotely etc.
• Confirmation of online card payments with Mobile PIN or biometrics
• Withdrawal from an ATM by mobile phone – the safest form of cash withdrawal without the need for a card and the card PIN
• Uploading of invoices in PDF format directly to the mobile app
• Authorized calls to our Contact centre from your app – you skip the authorization step and save several minutes of your time
• Postal order, IBAN and QR code scanner – you can easily pay invoices without lengthy filling in of data 
• Biometric login – used by up to 30% of our clients 
• Mobile payments support – add and manage your cards via the app
• Payment sharing – a quick way to share your IBAN or various payments and costs with other people via payment link (Payme) or QR code 
• Quick balance check on selected account – no log-in needed
• Overview of loans and an online loan application
• Online credit card loans payments
• Card blocking or temporary deactivation/activation in case of loss or theft
• Payment to a phone number

Other useful features: 
• Quick access to your selected features
• Quick balance for a selected account – account balance info without the need to login
• Overview and set up of notifications sent to your phone number, email, or as PUSH messages
• Management of standing orders and payment partners
• Unlimited payment operations
• Possibility to interact with a branch employee
• Planned payments – clearly structured into pending payments, standing orders and installments
• Daily savings
• Change the Internet limit on both debit and credit cards
• Credit card PIN display
• Change the limit for ATM withdrawals, merchant payments, and the maximum daily limit for debit cards
• Online opening of savings accounts and travel insurance purchase
• Product statements
• Overview of all banking products with the option to request them 
• Profile picture 
• Overview of direct debits authorizations
• Currency convertor and exchange rate
• Map of branches and ATMs
• Option to arrange an appointment with your personal bank advisor or banker

How do I activate the app?
To activate the application, you need to have the Nonstop banking service enabled. On the home screen of the Mobile banking app, click on the "Activation" button. Sign in with the ID number and password you use to log in to Internet banking. You will then receive an SMS with an activation code. Write it into the app and choose your new 4-digit Mobile PIN. If your device supports fingerprint scanning or Face ID, you can also activate this sign-in method.

How much will you pay for this service?
The Mobile banking app is free and does not contain any paid services. Fees for operations carried out through Mobile banking are subject to a valid price list of VÚB Bank.

If you don’t have the Nonstop banking service, or in case of any other questions, please contact us:
• via service KONTAKT at 0850 123 000 within Slovakia or at +421 2 4855 59 70 from abroad
• by e-mail at kontakt@vub.sk

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Ahoj, sme 365.bank a byť s nami je jednoduchšie, ako si čakal. 

Sme digitálni a sme aj s pobočkami. No v prvom rade sme plní ľudí, ktorým ide o to, aby všetci mohli na peniaze myslieť menej. Áno, aj ty. Čo pre teba máme? Produkty a vychytávky, ktoré dávajú zmysel.

Poďme sa teda pozrieť na to, čo sme si pre teba pripravili.

Stačí hodiť očkom a účet máš založený.

No fakt. Založíš ho jednoducho a bezpečne online, na pár ťukov, z pohodlia domova prostredníctvom tvárovej biometrie. Skvelé, že?

Na výber máš dva varianty:

Účet zadarmo, bez poplatku za vedenie a spoplatnený Účet plus s kopou výhod. A to celé s našou ekologickou digitálnou kartou, ktorú vieš využívať hneď po založení účtu. Celé dobre!

Digitálna karta ti je hneď k dispozícii

Platby môžeš navyše vykonávať nielen kartou, ale aj mobilom, hodinkami či prsteňom s Apple Pay, Google Pay, Garmin Pay, Fitbit Pay, Xiaomi a SwatchPay!

Využívaj výhody spolupráce s 365.Gopass

Máš Gopass aj účet v 365? Spáruj si kontá cez aplikácie a skvelé benefity sú tvoje. 

S nami šetríš

Máme pre teba špeciálny druh sporenia: Syslenie, s ktorým šetríš s každou platbou. Na svoje sny tak našetríš skôr, ako povieš 3-6-5. Pozri podmienky na 365.bank/sporenie-investovanie/syslenie.

Investuj kade chodíš 

S nami nemusíš nechávať svoje peniaze pod mintovým vankúšom. Investovať môžeš z kaviarne alebo pri venčení psa a to ako sa im darí uvidíš priamo v apke. Podmienky investovania nájdeš tu: 365.bank/sporenie-investovanie/investicne-sporenie

Pôžička či hypotéka z pohodlia domova. Aj to máme!

Požiadať o ne vieš jednoducho, za pár minút aj pri ležaní na gauči. Jednoducho, cez apku. Alebo nás navštív v pobočke, je to len na tebe!

Zabudni na čísla, použi emoji

Apku si môžeš zakódovať opicou, jednorožcom či pizzou, jednoducho s tvojim obľúbeným emoji. Náš PIE kód je bezpečnejší ako PIN a ľahšie sa pamätá. Ale hlavne je s ním väčšia sranda.

S našou apkou si môžeš potykať a oslovovať ťa bude podľa toho, ako si praješ. 

Stiahni si ju hneď teraz. Byť s nami je jednoduchšie, ako si čakal.

Tvoja 365-ka

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

The Raiffeisen Bank application allows you to access the bank’s website, where you can log into Internet Banking, using a mobile device according to Raiffeisen’s terms and conditions. 

To log into Raiffeisen Bank Internet Banking, enter your client number (given in your Framework Contract with us) and your Internet Banking password, and then confirm the login using the code you receive from us in an SMS. After logging into Internet Banking using the Raiffeisen Bank SK application, you can create a quick login option. When using the quick login option to access Internet Banking, simply enter your own numeric login code. This code is only valid for the mobile device and the browser you used to activate the quick login option.

The Internet Banking, offers the following services:
- access to information about the account, savings products, cards, consumer loans and supplementary pension saving  using the product overview and details functions,
- allocation of funds on the account using one-time payment orders, standing orders and directs debits,
- barcode scanner, QR codes scanner and IBAN account numbers scanner,
- change the limits, view PIN code and block payment card,
- push provisioning - possibility to automatically add a card to the Apple wallet,
- change of postal and e-mail address and mobile phone number,
- the account owner may change how account statements are delivered,
- creation, change and cancellation of PUSH or SMS account notifications,
- change of the login password for Internet Banking,
- activation and deactivation of the quick login option for Internet Banking,
- activation and deactivation of TouchID or FaceID login,
- message inbox,
- document inbox,
- localisation of equipment to locate the nearest ATM and provide navigation to it,
- download files and a possibility to save, share.

Should you have any questions, ideas or problems related to the application, please contact us via e-mail at info@raiffeisen.sk or using the contact details on the Raiffeisen Bank website: https://www.raiffeisen.sk/sk/o-banke/kontakty/

Terms of use for Internet Banking are given in Raiffeisen’s terms and conditions. Raiffeisen bank is Tatra banka, a.s., organizačná zložka podniku - Raiffeisen banka.

The Reader application is intended for clients of Raiffeisen Bank. It serves to confirm operations in Internet banking of Raiffeisen banka. 
Complete information as well as the scope and terms of use of the Reader can be found at www.raiffeisen.sk. 

- By scanning the face and ID card directly in the Reader application. For activation, it is necessary to have the client number, a valid SR ID card and an SMS code sent to the phone number registered in the bank.
- In person at the branch.
- By phone via Infolink.

The Reader requires an Internet connection for activation and updating. Subsequently, it can also be used offline.
During activation, the Reader prompts the user to set a login password and to set a fingerprint for more convenient login.
The current version of the Reader application is available for devices with the iOS 14.0 operating system and higher.

With Smart Banking, you always have your bank at your fingertips. The app is user-friendly and, most of all, secure. It enables you to enter payments, create and edit standing orders or repay your credit card. The app access as well as payment signatures are protected by your PIN code, fingerprint.

Smart Banking also includes Smart Key, with which you can authorize payments and other orders entered in Online Banking, both online and offline – using push notifications online or retrieving QR codes offline. You can also easily change your credentials in Smart Key. In case you forget your credentials, you can reset them using a photo of your registered identification documents and a selfie video. The app itself will guide you through resetting your credentials.

You can do much more with the app!

 • Learn about what’s going on in your account after you turn on the push notifications.
 • Transactions are automatically categorized and you can see your income and expenses in the Overviews section.
 • Have you lost a debit card? You can simply temporarily block and unblock the card for free in the app.
 • You can adjust the daily limit for debit card according to your needs.
 • Check your account balance even without signing in to the app using Widget.
 • You can also make payments by scanning a QR code (QR payment) or cheque.
 • You can use payment templates and beneficiaries saved in Online Banking also in the Smart Banking app.
 • Account statements, credit card statements and other documents are available in the Documents section.
 • Get an instant overview of currency rates.
 • Are you searching for an UniCredit Bank ATM or branch? You can find them in the app in an instant.


How to activate the app?

We have prepared a simple and unified activation process for you. Simply download the application and activate the application by using your Username and PIN. If you do not have this data, but you are a Client of UniCredit Bank, you can obtain it directly in the application.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

developer: KOOPERATIVA pois?ov?a, a.s. Vienna Insurance Group
description:
Uľahčite si život s aplikáciou od poisťovne KOOPERATIVA. Využite moderný a rýchly spôsob
nahlasovania a správy poistných udalostí vášho poistenia auta.

Intuitívne hlásenie poistných udalostí
Pri hlásení z miesta nehody môžete rovno vložiť vašu aktuálnu polohu aj nahrať všetky potrebné
fotografie. Ak sa na okamžité hlásenie necítite, môžete ho dokončiť kedykoľvek z pohodlia domova.

Prehľad rozpracovaných a dokončených hlásení
Všetky vaše hlásenia poistných udalostí nájdete v aplikácii na jednom mieste. Môžete sa k nim
kedykoľvek vrátiť, vymazať či upravovať ich až do momentu finálneho odoslania.

Stav riešenia poistnej udalosti
Priamo v aplikácii vás informujeme o stave riešenia vašej poistnej udalosti. Ak je nutné k riešeniu poistnej udalosti pridať ďalší dokument, aplikácia vás na to upozorní.

Jednoduchá úprava kontaktných údajov a profilu
Aplikácia umožňuje zmeniť vaše profilové údaje, ako napríklad e-mailovú či poštovú adresu
a kontaktný telefón. Zmena týchto údajov sa uloží do všetkých systémov poisťovne, a tak ju už
nemusíte hlásiť iným spôsobom. Udeliť alebo odobrať môžete tiež rôzne súhlasy, napríklad súhlas s elektronickou komunikáciou.

Užitočné funkcie, ktoré uľahčia život
Pri práci s aplikáciou vás budú sprevádzať inteligentné riešenia, ktoré sa vám hodia doma aj na cestách. Nechýba napríklad automatické rozoznávanie dokladov na nahraných fotografiách či možnosť rýchlo sa spojiť s asistenčnou službou.

SET UP AN INVESTMENT ACCOUNT IN 10 MINUTES
Becoming an investor with the Finax app is a matter of minutes. During those, we check your expectations and experience. It is completely OK if you don't have any. Investing can be set up for absolute beginners as well. 


INVEST LIKE A PRO, NO MATTER WHETHER OR NOT YOU ARE ONE
We will set up your investment strategy. Thus you can always be sure your investment setting will correspond to your investment period and risk approach. We will take care of your portfolio remaining properly rebalanced and diversified. You only need 10€ to start. Your money will be invested into global ETF index funds, comprising thousands of stocks and bonds. 


YOU MAY CHECK AND CHANGE EVERYTHING
With the Finax app, you can constantly track your investments. You will clearly see all the fees, discounts, or movement in your accounts. You may change the setting or withdraw the funds at any time. You may usually expect them in your bank account within 10 days.


ACQUIRE OVERVIEW OF YOUR EXPENSES AND WEALTH 
Connect your bank accounts through the Finax Coach and gain a complete overview of your money. Draw a budget and control how much you spend on groceries or other purchases. Get to know the net value of your wealth and see it change over time. 


INVEST, AND GET YOURSELF EDUCATED AND INSURED
Finax is not just passive investing. Those who wish to learn more about the world of personal finance will surely be interested in all the available blogs, podcasts, and webinars. We also offer lucrative life insurance. You may take it out directly in the app. 


QUICK FUNCTION OVERVIEW 
- opening an account and setting up the investment strategy,
- account and transaction overview,
- expense and family budget tracking,
- tracking the net wealth ,
- take out the life insurance,
- ability to change settings and personal data,
- logging in via Touch/Face ID,
- a quick deposit via Payme or QR code,
- access to PDF documents,
- inviting friends and overview of active discounts,
- access to blogs, videos, and podcasts.


FINAX O.C.P., A.S.
We are an investment broker, licensed by the National Bank of Slovakia. The clients' property is protected by the Investment guarantee fund. We are the first to offer the European Pension (PEPP) in Europe.

Pillow revolution in car, home, you and your loved ones insurance is finally here! You already have the bank in your mobile, and now it's the insurance company's turn. Even insurance can finally be transparent and fair.

Smart app together with Pillow insurance will save you time and money. You can inspect a newly insured vehicle in 5 minutes and send the number of kilometers driven within a minute. You will never again pay for kilometers that you have not driven or complicatedly negotiate the date of the entrance inspection, spend time on the way to the service or waiting for the technician. You certainly have more pleasant things to do.

In exchange for your thumbs up or smile, the app will display all your insurances down to the last pillow. You will immediately find out in your wallet whether everything is paid or whether any penny are missing or remaining. We love order, so we have all the news for you in one place, from the youngest to the oldest.

Accident? We will advise what to do and where to call. At the push of a button, we will call for help with changing a flat tire or a straight tow. Home emergency? A team of skilled craftsmen is ready to help in a situation that threatens your home. We know well that there are times when all you want is a soft pillow under your head.

Majte svoje financie neustále pod kontrolou a zároveň v bezpečí. Mobilná aplikácia od mBank spojila najpokročilejšie bezpečnostné systémy s užívateľsky prívetivým prostredím. Správa peňazí ešte nikdy nebola jednoduchšia.


Ako vám mobilná aplikácia od mBank zjednoduší život? 
1.	Prehľad o svojich financiách budete mať stále poruke – vďaka notifikáciám sa okamžite dozviete o každom pohybe na účte. 
2.	Otvorí vám cestu do sveta mobilných platieb – s bankou v mobile vám na bezkontaktné platby stačí telefón a palec alebo smart hodinky. 
3.	Posielanie peňazí bude otázkou niekoľkých kliknutí – ľahko a rýchlo pomocou QR kódov alebo pomocou platieb na mobilné číslo. 
4.	Online platby sa stanú ešte bezpečnejšie – Na ich potvrdenie využijete mobilnú autorizáciu, ktorú chráni váš unikátny PIN-kód alebo biometria. 
5.	Zjednoduší vám správu platobných kariet – nastavenie limitov, zmena PIN kódu alebo rýchle zablokovanie karty. 
6.	Sprístupní vám výhody virtuálnych kariet – eKartu si jednoducho objednáte priamo v aplikácii. 
7.	Umožní vám vybaviť si pôžičku, sporenie, poistenie a ďalšie bankové produkty – predschválenú pôžičku môžete mať na účte do 3 minút. 


Pokiaľ ide o bezpečnosť, sme nekompromisní
Bezpečnosť vašich financií je pre nás prioritou. Preto mobilnú aplikáciu od mBank chránia tie najpokročilejšie funkcie. 
-	Prihlásenie a každý úkon potvrdzujete vami zvoleným unikátnym PIN kódom alebo pomocou odtlačku prsta, prípadne skenu tváre.
-	Pri krádeži telefónu aplikáciu odpojíte prostredníctvom internet bankingu. 
-	Vďaka pokročilým šifrovacím protokolom nikto nezneužije vaše heslá, PIN kódy ani ďalšie osobné údaje.


Ešte nemáte mKonto?
Vyhnite sa návštevám pobočiek. Bankový účet od mBank si pohodlne založíte odkiaľkoľvek. Stiahnite si mobilnú aplikáciu mBank a dostaňte svoje financie pod kontrolu ešte dnes.
